name: GAP Women's 2-Pack Crewneck Favorite Tee T-Shirt
reviews: These are, as the name implies, my favorite.  They are the perfect length, nice and soft, and they are just the right fit‚Ä¶not too baggy but not to snug either.  And I got them at a downright steal, so that just makes them score even higher.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 18 August 2023

name: GAP Women's 2-Pack Crewneck Favorite Tee T-Shirt
reviews: Buena calidad de la tela, funcionan excelente para climas calurosos, la tela es muy suave.
date.of.review: Reviewed in Mexico on 22 April 2023

name: GAP Women's 2-Pack Crewneck Favorite Tee T-Shirt
reviews: The T shirt has a cute flattering fit.  I do prefer a narrower "trim" to finish a collar so that it is a more feminine tee, but no biggie.  I would prefer a cotton/poly mix over the modal so that it is washable/dryable and durable.  Modal makes it soft but not durable.  I do not favor see-through tees and this is a little too thin.  If you like the details of your bra to shine through (ie patterns, flowers, etc...) then this tee is for you.  I thought I would try this tee due to its ratings, and it is okay.  I would truly rate it a 3 and 1/2 stars.  I washed once in cold and dried flat and it shrunk lengthwise, if this were a quality long fiber cotton, it shouldn't have shrunk this much.  Not sure why that happened at all.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 31 July 2023

name: GAP Women's 2-Pack Crewneck Favorite Tee T-Shirt
reviews: Love these t-shirts, especially when you can find them on sale. They fit true to size, good quality, soft, and wash nicely.I bought the small, fit great (a smudge tight in the bust area, and I do NOT have a well-endowed bust).For price and quality, these are a great buy!
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 26 April 2023

name: GAP Women's 2-Pack Crewneck Favorite Tee T-Shirt
reviews: I love these so much. So soft and comfortable for around the house, grocery shopping, and even under a nice sweater for work. OMG!! the price is unbeatable for the quality. I like these for hot NC summers. Perfect weight. I am going to keep buying these - over and over and over.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 4 July 2023

name: GAP Women's 2-Pack Crewneck Favorite Tee T-Shirt
reviews: I'm a t shirt girlie. Slim fitting, long enough to tuck in if you chose. Some stretch, haven't noticed fading after a few washes. I'd say size down. I normallyWear a M, but I order small in GAP. Great staple pieces, a great backdrop for fun accessories or jewelry.
